title.narrative: (ACF) Improvement and reinforcement of livelihoods, food security, health and nutrition status of marginalized and vulnerable groups in border states, Myanmar

description.narrative:
Goal: Contribute to the improvement and reinforcement of livelihoods, food security, health and nutrition status of marginalized and vulnerable groups in border states of Myanmar.
Specific objective 1: To enhance livelihood resilience and improve food security for targeted communities in Paletwa Township, Chin State. Specific objective 2: To improve the dietary intake of vulnerable populations in Kayah State. Specific objective 3: To contribute to the reduction of child malnutrition, mortality and morbidity in Northern Rakhine State.
Expected results: - 1000 households have improved their knowledge of optimal food utilization, nutrition, infant and children feeding and care. - The targeted rural/peri-urban households (1400 households) have an improved physical and financial access to micronutrient-rich food through increased nutritious food production and nutrition-sensitive livelihoods and Income Generating Activities (IGA).
